Chapter4 Woody Plants For life history, mention common canopy positions - information from Ramage et al. 2017 - dominant canopy are Liriondendron tulipifera (tulip poplar), Carya spp., Quercus spp., Fraxinus americana (white ash), Nyssa sylvatica (black gum) 4.1 Adoxaceae 4.1.1 Sambucus canadensis var. canadensis (L.)
